attributes.action: Change the buses on one london bus route to fully hydrogen within the next year
attributes.additional_details: Because its a step towards a zero emisson country to let future generations live sustanibly
attributes.background: Review the emisson of buses and consider switching to hydrogen buses instead, to lower the impact buses are having on the planet.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. Transport is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:
